list_definition.definition: to put (an idea etc) before another person etc for consideration; to propose

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I suggest doing it a different way
She suggested to me one or two suitable people for the committee
I suggest that we have lunch now.

list_definition.mean_english: xảy đến với ai, nảy ra trong trí óc
list_definition.definition: to put (an idea etc) into a person’s mind; to hint

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Are you suggesting that I’m too old for the job?
An explanation suddenly suggested itself to me.
